page.title: 17Trentham Church - 2
page.content: In 1984 there were 73 baptisms, 34 marriages and 27 funerals. There are three Sunday Services: Holy Communion at 8.30. (average attendance 30) Family Communion at 10.30. (average attendance 120 - 200) and Evensong at 6.30. (average attendance 40). Parish activities include: Sunday School, A Pathfinders Group for 11 to 13 year olds, Scouts and Guides, A Bible Study and Prayer Group, Mothers' Union and a Young Wives Group. Other groups such as Playgroup, Mothers and Toddlers and Keep Fit also use the Church Centre. It costs about 33000 pounds p.a. to run the church. Almost half of this is paid to the Lichfield Diocese and about one third is given to charities. Separate from the church, on the other side of the main road (A 34) is the Sutherland Mausoleum and the Churchyard.
